name: Debt-Free Delight
title: Lowest Public Debt Service
description: In 2023, Algeria's public and publicly guaranteed debt service was only 0.19% of its exports, showcasing its strong fiscal management.

name: Fossil Fuel Fanatic
title: 100% Fossil Fuel Energy Consumption
description: Algeria's energy consumption in 2022 was entirely reliant on fossil fuels, highlighting a need for diversification.

name: Reserves Rich
title: Highest Total Reserves to External Debt Ratio
description: With reserves at 1110.24% of its total external debt in 2023, Algeria stands strong in financial stability.

name: Literacy Leap
title: Youth Literacy Gender Parity
description: In 2019, Algeria achieved a gender parity index of 1.23 in youth literacy, indicating balanced educational opportunities.

name: Market Cap Mystery
title: Lowest Market Capitalization
description: In 2018, Algeria's market capitalization was just 0.19% of its GDP, suggesting limited stock market activity.

name: Minimal Education Expenditure
title: Lowest Primary Education Expenditure
description: In 2023, only 1.40% of total expenditure in primary public institutions was allocated to current education, indicating potential underfunding.

name: Loan Light
title: Minimal IBRD and IDA Loans
description: In 2016, Algeria's IBRD loans and IDA credits were a mere $725,000, reflecting limited reliance on international borrowing.
